file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Roasted.email - API V1
  version: v1
paths:
  "/api/v1/mailbox/{mailbox_id}/emails":
    parameters:
    - name: mailbox_id
      in: path
      description: mailbox_id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    - name: page
      in: query
      description: Page number
      schema:
        type: string
    get:
      summary: Retrieves emails from a mailbox
      tags:
      - Emails
      security:
      - Token: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/mailbox_emails"
        '401':
          description: authentication failed
          content: {}
  "/api/v1/mailbox/{mailbox_id}/emails/{id}":
    parameters:
    - name: mailbox_id
      in: path
      description: mailbox_id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    - name: id
      in: path
      description: email id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    get:
      summary: shows email full details
      tags:
      - Emails
      security:
      - Token: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/mailbox_emails"
        '401':
          description: authentication failed
          content: {}
    delete:
      summary: deletes an email
      tags:
      - Emails
      security:
      - Token: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: successful
          content: {}
        '401':
          description: authentication failed
          content: {}
  "/api/v1/mailbox":
    post:
      summary: creates a mailbox
      tags:
      - Mailbox
      description: Generates a random mailbox. API method is capped at 15 requests
        every 24 seconds (or 1 request every 1.6 seconds)
      responses:
        '201':
          description: mailbox created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/mailbox"
        '429':
          description: too many requests
          headers:
            RateLimit-Limit:
              type: integer
              description: The number of allowed requests in the current period
            Rate-Limit-Remaining:
              type: integer
              description: The number of remaining requests in the current period
            Rate-Limit-Reset:
              type: integer
              description: The unix timestamp when the limit resets
          content: {}
  "/api/v1/mailbox/{id}":
    parameters:
    - name: id
      in: path
      description: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    get:
      summary: Retrieves a mailbox
      tags:
      - Mailbox
      security:
      - Token: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/mailbox"
        '401':
          description: authentication failed
          content: {}
    delete:
      summary: deletes mailbox
      tags:
      - Mailbox
      security:
      - Token: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: successful
          content: {}
        '401':
          description: authentication failed
          content: {}
servers:
- url: https://{defaultHost}
  variables:
    defaultHost:
      default: roasted.email
components:
  securitySchemes:
    Token:
      description: Mailbox Token in the header
      type: apiKey
      name: X-TOKEN
      in: header
  schemas:
    mailbox:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        email:
          type: string
        token:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
        expires_at:
          type: string
        last_email_id:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
        last_email_received_at:
          type: string
          nullable: true
    email:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        text:
          type: string
        html:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string
        from:
          type: object
          properties:
            name:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            email:
              type: string
        subject:
          type: string
        headers:
          type: string
        received_at:
          type: string
        sender_ip:
          type: string
        attachments:
          type: array
          items:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/attachment"
    attachment:
      type: object
      properties:
        filename:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
    pagination:
      type: object
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
        items:
          type: integer
        last:
          type: integer
        next:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
        prev:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
        page:
          type: integer
    mailbox_emails:
      type: object
      properties:
        emails:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: integer
              text:
                type: string
              subject:
                type: string
              received_at:
                type: string
              from:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                  email:
                    type: string
        pagy:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/pagination"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/api/v1/mailbox": post: responses: 429: headers: header "Rate-Limit-Remaining": at 1:2068: parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
